channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ByHeart baby formula from all lots may be contaminated with botulism bacteria, tests show
item.description: The makers of ByHeart infant formula say tests of products tied to a botulism outbreak show that all of the company's products may have been contamina...

item.title: As Black women face unemployment challenges, policymaker roundtable seeks solutions
item.description: Policymakers, organizers and business owners have gathered to tackle how to address rising unemployment among Black women

item.title: Torn roofs, smashed windows among damage to over 100 homes in a tornado near Houston
item.description: A tornado has damaged over 100 homes north of Houston, tearing off roofs and moving garages off foundations

item.title: Gramma the Gal√°pagos tortoise, oldest resident of San Diego Zoo, dies at about 141
item.description: The beloved Galapagos tortoise named Gramma that was the oldest resident of the San Diego Zoo at an estimated 141 years has died

item.title: Turkey pardons offer holiday ritual during precarious moment for Trump
item.description: President Donald Trump plans to pardon two turkeys and head to his Florida resort to celebrate Thanksgiving
